sources.name: Google News (India)
sources.description: Comprehensive, up-to-date India news coverage, aggregated from sources all over the world by Google News.

sources.name: The Hindu
sources.description: The Hindu. latest news, analysis, comment, in-depth coverage of politics, business, sport, environment, cinema and arts from India's national newspaper.

sources.name: The Times of India
sources.description: Times of India brings the Latest News and Top Breaking headlines on Politics and Current Affairs in India and around the World, Sports, Business, Bollywood News and Entertainment, Science, Technology, Health and Fitness news, Cricket and opinions from leading columnists.
